cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a 4-Door 4x4 1992 Suzuki Sidekick with 92000 miles.  Clean interior, runs great, manual windows.
This is a 2-Door hatchback Pontiac Firebird with 40000 miles.  Excellent condition and clean vehicle history.
